carry_unit_type.description: [unit]If specified, checks if the unit is supposed to be linked to us

carry_entity_type.description: If specified, checks if the entity type is supposed to be linked to us

link_type.description: The mode used for figuring out how carryables are linked to us

sequential_interactions.description: [bool]If enabled, when dropping off a carryable, we will enable the next interactable zone
